author: Sean Sullivan, Seung Min Kim, Tyler Pager
title: Biden interviews at least two Supreme Court contenders as announcement nears
description: As the president enters the final stages of his Supreme Court selection process, the White House has begun advising allies on how to push back against expected attacks.
content: One of the interviews was with Judge Ketanji Brown Jackson, who has sat on the federal bench for nine years and has a background as a public defender, according to one of the people. Another was withâ€¦ [+6016 chars]
